definition: Lester or Leicester (name)/Leicester, English city in East Midlands
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Lester was gone, and I brushed the powder away before anyone could see it.
sentences.chinese: 莱斯特跑了，而我趁还没人看见，扫掉了粉末。

sentences.english: And you probably know that Leicester Square is where all the big film premieres happen.
sentences.chinese: 你可能知道，莱斯特广场是所有电影巨作的首映现场。

sentences.english: There's a film premiere for some big movie in Leicester Square.
sentences.chinese: 会在莱斯特广场上演电影巨作的首映式。

sentences.english: Lester had been famous among the line workers for a magic trick.
sentences.chinese: 莱斯特在一线员工中以一种魔术把戏而闻名。

sentences.english: The Radisson Leicester Square is just on that side street, you can't miss it.
sentences.chinese: 拉迪逊莱斯特广场就在那个小街上，很好找。

sentences.english: Lester is accused of fatally shooting 36-year-old Ronald E.
sentences.chinese: 莱斯特被控射杀36岁的罗纳德东施拉特。

sentences.english: Leicester Square is a mess at the moment
sentences.chinese: 现在莱斯特广场一团糟。

sentences.english: Lester asked the questions,and Angela kept getting them right.
sentences.chinese: 莱斯特提的问题，安吉拉回答各个正确。

sentences.english: Father had found Lester the morning after his death.
sentences.chinese: 莱斯特死后的第二天早晨，父亲发现了他。

sentences.english: Lester Burnham teaches us all a valuable lesson.
sentences.chinese: 莱斯特伯恩汉姆教我们上了一堂有价值的课。

sentences.english: Can you tell us about Leicester Square?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我们讲讲莱斯特广场吗？

sentences.english: As well as being a magician of sorts, Lester had been a drunk.
sentences.chinese: 就像作为魔术师一样，莱斯特也勉强算作一个酒鬼。

sentences.english: We went to the Leicestershire Museum and Art Gallery first.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了莱斯特博物馆和艺术馆。

sentences.english: My family owned a large hosiery manufacturing company in Leicester, England.
sentences.chinese: 我家在英国莱斯特拥有一家大型制袜公司。

sentences.english: It's never too late to get it back.
sentences.chinese: 莱斯特，你还可以再令我迟到一些吗？

sentences.english: Leicester Square again is a massive tourist area.
sentences.chinese: 再次说一下，莱斯特广场是一个旅游胜地。

definition: Everton (town in northwest England)/Everton soccer team
